name: jekyll_pages_api_search
description: Adds lunr.js search to Jekyll sites using jekyll_pages_api
author: Mike Bland <michael.bland@gsa.gov> (https://18f.gsa.gov/)

scripts.lint: eslint assets/js/search.js assets/js/search-engine.js assets/js/search-ui.js lib/jekyll_pages_api_search/*.js test/*-test.js test/helpers/*.js
scripts.serve-tests: browserify test/*-test.js -o test/helpers/test-bundle.js && node test/helpers/build-test-index.js && http-server -c-1 .
